data.title: ESPN.com's Dave McMenamin on historic Warriors
data.meta_description: In our latest Planet Dubs podcast, Mark Medina has an exclusive interview with ESPN.com's Dave McMenamin as they discuss the upcoming Warriors-Cavaliers game and the historic nature of their rivalry.
data.text:
Breaking News

(Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Draymond Green (23) reacts after Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) loses control of the ball in the second quarter of Game 2 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 5, 2016. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Jane Tyska/Bay Area News Group

Golden State Warriors' Kevin Durant (35) blocks a shot by Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) in the final minute of the fourth quarter of their NBA game at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Monday, Dec. 25, 2017. (Jane Tyska/Bay Area News Group)

(Jane Tyska/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Draymond Green (23) drives past Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) in the first quarter of their NBA game at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Monday, Dec. 25, 2017. (Jane Tyska/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Kevin Durant (35) is congratulated by Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) after the Warriors beat the Cavaliers 99-92 in their NBA game at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Monday, Dec. 25, 2017. (Jane Tyska/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors Stephen Curry celebrates from the sideline in the fourth quarter of their NBA game against the Cleveland Cavaliers at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Monday, Dec. 25, 2017. Curry was still out with an injury. (Jane Tyska/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Kevin Durant (35) dribbles past Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) in the first quarter of Game 1 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Thursday, June 1, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) gestures while being guarded by Golden State Warriors' Kevin Durant (35) during the fourth quarter of Game 4 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Friday, June 9, 2017. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group Archives)

CLEVELAND, OH - JUNE 09: Kevin Durant #35 of the Golden State Warriors competes for the ball with Tristan Thompson #13 of the Cleveland Cavaliers in the second half in Game 4 of the 2017 NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena on June 9, 2017 in Cleveland, Ohio. NOTE TO USER: User expressly acknowledges and agrees that, by downloading and or using this photograph, User is consenting to the terms and conditions of the Getty Images License Agreement. (Photo by Ron Schwane - Pool/Getty Images)

Golden State Warriors' Klay Thompson (11) fouls Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) in the third quarter of Game 2 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 4, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Kevin Durant (35) is fouled by Cleveland Cavaliers' Kyrie Irving (2) in the second quarter of Game 1 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Thursday, June 1, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Kevin Durant (35) dunks the ball in front of Cleveland Cavaliers' Iman Shumpert (4) in the second quarter of Game 1 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Thursday, June 1, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

LeBron James #23 of the Cleveland Cavaliers drives to the basket against Shaun Livingston #34 and Matt Barnes #22 of the Golden State Warriors in the first quarter in Game 4 of the 2017 NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena on June 9, 2017 in Cleveland, Ohio. (Photo by Jason Miller/Getty Images)

Golden State Warriors' Kevin Durant (35) blocks a shot by Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) during the first quarter of Game 1 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Thursday, June 1, 2017. The Golden State Warriors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers 113-91. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors’ Draymond Green (23) fights for the ball against Cleveland Cavaliers’ Kyrie Irving (2) in the second quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors’ Draymond Green (23) guards Cleveland Cavaliers’ LeBron James (23) during the first quarter of Game 3 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Wednesday, June 7, 2017. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' Kyrie Irving (2) and Golden State Warriors' Andre Iguodala (9) battle for a loose ball in the second half of an NBA basketball game, Sunday, Dec. 25, 2016, in Cleveland. The Cavaliers won 109-108. (AP Photo/Tony Dejak)

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) goes up for a layup while being guarded by Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry (30) and Golden State Warriors' Draymond Green (23) during the first quarter of Game 1 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Thursday, June 1, 2017. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Draymond Green (23) blocks the final shot of the first quarter of Game 3 against Cleveland Cavaliers' Kyrie Irving (2) for the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Wednesday, June 7, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Draymond Green (23) manages to block a shot by Cleveland Cavaliers' J.R. Smith (5) during the first quarter of Game 5 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Monday, June 12, 2017. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) hugs Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr as Golden State Warriors' Kevin Durant (35) celebrates with teammate Stephen Curry (30) after winning Game 5 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Monday, June 12, 2017. The Golden State Warriors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers 129-120 to win the NBA Championship. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

The Golden State Warriors celebrate as they hold the championship trophy after defeating the Cleveland Cavaliers in Game 5 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Monday, June 12, 2017. The Golden State Warriors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers 129-120 to win the NBA Championship. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) takes a shot against Golden State Warriors' Draymond Green (23) and Golden State Warriors' Ian Clark (21) in the fourth quarter of Game 3 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Wednesday, June 7, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' David West (3) and Cleveland Cavaliers' Tristan Thompson (13) get physical while reaching for a ball against Cleveland Cavaliers' Kyrie Irving (2) during the second quarter of Game 5 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Monday, June 12, 2017. Both players would get a technical foul. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

The Golden State Warriors' David West (3) gets into it with the Cleveland Cavaliers' Tristan Thompson (13) in the second quarter of Game 5 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Monday, June 12, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Getty Images

LeBron James (23) of the Cleveland Cavaliers and Kevin Durant (35) of the Golden State Warriors speak after a foul in the third quarter in Game 4 of the 2017 NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena on June 9, 2017 in Cleveland, Ohio. (Jason Miller/Getty Images)

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) lays on the floor after colliding with another player during their game against the Golden State Warriors in the first quarter of Game 3 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Wednesday, June 7, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Shaun Livingston (34) fouls Cleveland Cavaliers' Kyrie Irving (2) in the third quarter of Game 3 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Wednesday, June 7, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Kevin Durant (35) fights for a rebound against Cleveland Cavaliers' Iman Shumpert (4) in the third quarter of Game 3 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Wednesday, June 7, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry (30) takes a shot against Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) in the second half of Game 3 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Wednesday, June 7, 2017. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) is surrounded by his teammate during player introductions before Game 3 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Wednesday, June 7, 2017. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Klay Thompson (11) battles Cleveland Cavaliers' Kevin Love (0) for a rebound during the second quarter of Game 3 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Wednesday, June 7, 2017. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' Kevin Love (0) injuries himself while leaping for a rebound against the Golden State Warriors during the fourth quarter of Game 3 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Wednesday, June 7, 2017. The Golden State Warriors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers 118-113. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Anderson Varejao (18) fouls Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) in the first quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) kisses the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy after the Cavaliers beat the Golden State Warriors in Game 7 93-89 to win the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' Kyrie Irving (2) is hugged from behind by assistant coach Phil Handy after defeating the Golden State Warriors in Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Golden State Warriors 93-89 to win the NBA championship. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' Kyrie Irving (2) makes a three-point basket over Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry (30) with 54.7 seconds left in the fourth quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Golden State Warriors 93-89 to win the NBA championship. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

A Golden State Warriors fan holds his homemade sign before the Warriors game against the Cleveland Cavaliers for Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors fans react to a play during their game against the Cleveland Cavaliers in the third quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) takes a shot against Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry (30) in the fourth quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) blocks a shot against Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry (30) in the second quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

(Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James (23) lands on Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry (30) while reaching for a loose ball in the third quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Golden State Warriors 93-89 to win the NBA championship. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

The Cleveland Cavaliers bench reacts after a three-point basket against the Golden State Warriors in the second quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' Richard Jefferson (24) guards Golden State Warriors' Andre Iguodala (9) in the third quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Golden State Warriors 93-89 to win the NBA championship. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Cleveland Cavaliers' Tristan Thompson (13) fouls Golden State Warriors' Festus Ezeli (31) during a layup in the first quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Draymond Green (23) goes up for a layup past Cleveland Cavaliers' Tristan Thompson (13) in the first half of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Golden State Warriors 93-89 to win the NBA championship. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry (30) walks on the floor during a timeout against the Cleveland Cavaliers in the fourth quarter of Game 7 of the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Golden State Warriors 93-89 to win the NBA championship. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr and general manager Bob Myers leave the court after the Cleveland Cavaliers won Game 7 93-89 for the NBA Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, Calif., on Sunday, June 19, 2016. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

The Golden State Warriors celebrate after winning the NBA Championship after defeating the Cleveland Cavaliers in Game 6 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Tuesday, June 16, 2015. Golden State defeated Cleveland 105-97. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

The Golden State Warriors celebrate after winning the NBA Championship after defeating the Cleveland Cavaliers in Game 6 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Tuesday, June 16, 2015. Golden State defeated Cleveland 105-97. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors' Draymond Green (23) fouls Cleveland Cavaliers' Timofey Mozgov (20) in the second quarter of Game 6 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Tuesday, June 16, 2015. (Nhat V. Meyer/Bay Area News Group)

Golden State Warriors'Stephen Curry (30) lays up a shot against the Cleveland Cavaliers in the first quarter of Game 6 of the NBA Finals at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland, Ohio, on Tuesday, June 16, 2015. (Jose Carlos Fajardo/Bay Area News Group)

(Click here, if you are unable to view this photo gallery on your mobile device.)

Golden State and Cleveland will meet again on Monday night in an NBA Finals rematch/preview. Mark Medina caught up with ESPN.com’s Dave McMenamin, who covers the Cavaliers, to preview this match-up and discuss the historical nature of this rivalry, plus discuss his new book, “Return of the King.”

Originally Published: January 11, 2018 at 9:18 a.m.
